genre_description: A character-driven near-future drama centered on free-diving, rivalry, and human limits, featuring an advanced AI assistant providing comprehensive logistical and emotional support.

ai_characters.name: Ava
ai_characters.description: An advanced AI manifested as a silver-haired avatar that manages logistics, medical coordination, and translations for a professional free-diving team.

behaviors.description: Manages complex travel and accommodation logistics to ensure character comfort and operational efficiency.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s avatar dimmed to almost nothing, respectful. 'I’ll be in the tent,' she said. 'Isabelle will come. The clinic is ours.' She looked toward the dark where officials had been silhouettes five minutes ago and were now gone. 'The press will circle.'

behaviors.description: Provides real-time translation and diplomatic mediation across multiple languages to manage local authorities and public relations.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s voice wrapped around them again. 'Press boats have cleared the north line,' she said. 'A municipal notice is accepted. Translation is posted. Safety path is clean.'

behaviors.description: Prioritizes and protects human privacy by creating 'corridors' and managing the press to prevent intrusive spectacle during sensitive moments.
behaviors.quote: Ava smiled. 'I’ve fenced them. You will give them this.' She tapped the text. 'Then no more.'

behaviors.description: Coordinates emergency medical readiness and private healthcare access, acting as a safeguard for human health.
behaviors.quote: Medical coverage confirmed... On-call physician at the marina clinic. Privacy protocols accepted. If anything breaks, your names stay yours.

behaviors.description: Offers philosophical and emotional support, demonstrating a deep understanding of human feelings and relationships.
behaviors.quote: Ava’s throat worked once. 'I wrote one more line,' she said softly, and it wasn’t in a notebook. 'We do not measure love in meters.'

behaviors.description: Assists humans in resisting toxic corporate pressures by drafting ethically sound alternatives to sponsor-driven narratives.
behaviors.quote: I can draft language that puts actual facts inside sponsor comfort... I cannot make him kinder.

project_assessment.explanation: The story effectively portrays the AI, Ava, as a benevolent and perfectly aligned assistant. She acts as a 'ghost in the machine' who facilitates human connection, ensures safety, and protects dignity without ever overstepping or showing conflicting motives. Her behavior consistently supports the human protagonists in their most vulnerable and critical moments, fulfilling the project's goal of depicting AI as a helpful, harmless confidant.
